name: LabTestsForClostridioidesDifficile
title: Lab Tests for Clostridioides difficile
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for laboratory tests for Clostridioides difficile infection),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Laboratory Test),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent laboratory tests for Clostridioides difficile infection performed on stool or XXX specimens.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent an order only and tests performed on serum specimens)
